v2.headline: Executive Coach, helping senior leaders on their journey to VP+ level. Leadership Consultant for High Performing Organizations. Trusted by Fortune 500 leaders. Supporting clients globally in both English and French.
v2.about:
I believe every talent should be celebrated.

Too often, ambitious leaders work hard, earn the title, yet still feel invisible, overextended, or disconnected from what truly matters. 

And many organizations sometimes push for results but overlook the human side of leadership, leaving potential untapped.

This is where I come in.

I‚Äôm Fatou, Executive & Leadership Coach and Consultant, with 20+ years of experience across industries. I‚Äôm certified by Columbia University, with advanced leadership credentials from Yale Business School and IMD Switzerland. I founded Sargal Coaching (Sargal means ‚Äúcelebrate‚Äù in my home country, Senegal) to support leaders and organizations in building recognition, influence, and sustainable success.

üöÄ For senior executives & leaders:

I run The Executive Edge, a high-touch coaching program designed to help you:
	‚Ä¢	Gain clarity on your career vision and roadmap.
	‚Ä¢	Strengthen your executive presence and influence.
	‚Ä¢	Increase your visibility and recognition at the highest levels.
	‚Ä¢	Create balance so success is sustainable, not exhausting.

This is not about working harder, it‚Äôs about being seen, valued, and celebrated for your true impact.

üè¢ For organizations:

As a Leadership Consultant, I help companies improve performance through human-centered leadership.
That means designing leadership cultures where:
	‚Ä¢	Managers lead with empathy and influence, not just authority.
	‚Ä¢	Teams are engaged, resilient, and aligned with strategic goals.
	‚Ä¢	Performance improves because people feel valued, recognized, and empowered.

Through consulting projects, workshops, and executive development initiatives, I work with organizations who understand that business results and human-centered leadership go hand in hand.

üåü My philosophy:

Leadership is not just about hitting targets, it‚Äôs about creating environments where people thrive and performance follows naturally.

If you‚Äôre a senior leader ready to step into recognition and balance, or a corporate leader looking to transform leadership culture, let‚Äôs connect.

üì© DM me here on LinkedIn or directly book a call. 

https://calendly.com/fseckmathon/clarity-call?

v1.about:
As an Executive and Leadership Coach, I am passionate about empowering leaders to unlock their full potential and create impactful, lasting change within their organizations. With a focus on emotional intelligence, I guide leaders to enhance their influence and cultivate a thriving team environment.

Over the years, I've partnered with executives across diverse industries, equipping them with the skills and insights necessary to drive meaningful transformation and achieve their professional goals. My tailored coaching approach combines proven strategies with a deep understanding of human behavior, enabling leaders to navigate complex challenges with confidence and clarity.

I firmly believe that effective leadership stems from the ability to connect on a personal level while inspiring others to excel. Whether you're looking to enhance your leadership skills, improve team dynamics, or drive organizational growth, I'm here to support your journey to success.

Sargal means celebrate in Senegalese, my country of origin. I believe we all have talents to celebrate.

Connect with me to discover how you can elevate your leadership impact and create a legacy of positive influence.
v1.headline: Helping female leaders on their journey to VP+ level. Lead boldly without compromising who you are. Executive Coach and Leadership Consultant. Trusted by Fortune 500 leaders. Supporting clients globally üåé.
